title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.13 - Hearing officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.13 - Hearing officer

State Regulations

Hearing officer may be used interchangeably with the
term "administrative law judge" and both terms mean an attorney assigned by OAH
to preside at hearings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
358-2.13

Amended

New

York State Register February 19, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 07, eff. 2/19/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
